title: Survey Form - HCA Bio Honors Project 2023
description: Thank you for participating in this survey! Your contribution is greatly appreciated.
completedHtml: Thank you for completing the survey! I am so so so grateful for your contribution. Remember to check back in each end of a block, and use the same email address! Cheers!

pages.name: consent

elements.name: consent_question
elements.title: Do you accept the terms and conditions?

validators.text: You have ownership of your data. The survey will close and your information will not be given out by this project in any form.

pages.title: User Data Consent Agreement
pages.description: nothing scary! I promise! This is just permission for your responses to be used in the reports and data analysis of this project.

pages.name: student_info

elements.name: email_address
elements.title: Email
elements.placeholder: Your email here. Student email is encouraged!

elements.name: room_num
elements.title: Room Number
elements.description: Please select the room you spent the majority of your class-time in.

pages.title: Student Information
pages.description: If you provide an email, I will send you a personalized report before the end of the year of how your data worked! (A lot like Spotify Wrapped) If enough people sign-up, I will see if I could leave the study in all year. Of course, with wayy less surveys so they don't get too tedious.

elements.name: fatigue
elements.description: No fatigue or tiredness: 1 - 10: Very fatigued and tired (fell asleep during class)
elements.title: During class, or during testing, were you feeling tired or fatigued?
elements.maxRateDescription: Very fatigued and tired (fell asleep during class)

elements.name: distractions
elements.title: Were there any major distractions or interruptions during class or testing?
elements.description: If you weren't gobsmacked and utterly driven to derail from class, feel free to select "No" :)

elements.name: meds
elements.title: Are there any medications that would have affected your brain's function during class?

elements.name: subs
elements.title: Have you taken any substances (such as caffeine or alcohol) that may have impacted your body during class?

elements.name: discomfort
elements.title: Were you experiencing any physical or emotional discomfort that may have affected your ability to concentrate or mental state in class?

elements.name: sleep
elements.title: Did you get enough sleep last night?
elements.description: 6-8 hours is a good range to call "enough" sleep. I myself, can barely catch a 7. In case you are unaware of your hours, here is an easy test: ~2 hours after you woke up, did you feel refreshed, or did you feel fatigued? refreshed = yes; fatigued = no.

pages.name: reaction_time

elements.name: question1
elements.html:
<iframe src="https://humanbenchmark.com/tests/reactiontime"></iframe>
<style>
	/* make the size of the page 1080 by 1280 */

	/* make all iframes take up the whole screen without using percentages*/
	iframe {
		width: 70vw;
		height: 100vh;
	}
	/* remove the border */
	iframe {
		border: none;
	}
	/* remove the scrollbars */
	iframe {
		overflow: hidden;
	}
	/* remove the padding */
	iframe {
		padding: 0;
	}
	/* remove the margin */
	iframe {
		margin: 0;
	}
	/* remove the background */
	iframe {
		background: transparent;
	}
</style>

elements.name: reaction_time_ms
elements.title: Complete the test above until you get your average reaction time.
elements.description: (This is when the screen has the buttons: "save score" and "try again")

pages.title: Reaction Time | PLEASE READ BELOW THIS
pages.description:
IF THERE IS ISSUES WITH "ADBLOCKER", FIND THE TEXT "CONTINUE WITHOUT DISABLING"; click it. :)
This is the true data collection, so please follow the instructions carefully! Thank you for participating.
If at any point you need to reenter an answer, delete all text fully, then click outside the box and wait for the game to return.

pages.name: page2

elements.name: Please take a visual memory test.
elements.html:

elements.name: visual_mem_level
elements.title: Complete the test above until you get your visual memory score level.
elements.description: (This is when the screen has the buttons: "save score" and "try again")

pages.title: Visual Memory Test
pages.description: You may want to max out at level 10 for time purposes.

elements.name: chimp_score
elements.title: Complete the test above until you get your chimp number score.
elements.description: (Take your time, but don't let this take up too much time. Beat the chimpanzee's score and get above 9!)
